Enum SqlRaceRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<SqlRaceRepository>

    public enum SqlRaceRepository
extends java.lang.Enum<SqlRaceRepository>
implements RaceRepository
    Implementation of RaceRepository interface that uses sql database as a data source.
